name: Diving City
storyline: Diving City is an action RPG with strategy elements, featuring Karl, who has been trapped in Luvania, an underground megacity built by a mysterious civilisation, for reasons unknown. Despite his basic combat training, Karl will have to collect elemental cubes from the surroundings and create makeshift traps to unlock the way forward when facing the indescribable mechanical guards in the underground world.
